overview: When a cavorting Hollywood writer is killed by the angry husband of a woman he was having an affair with, he comes back as a spirit in the form of a beautiful woman and moves in with his/her best friend as a base operation for enacting sweet revenge.
tagline: They don't make girls like "Charlie" anymore -- they never did!
cast: Tony Curtis|Debbie Reynolds|Pat Boone|Joanna Barnes|Ellen Burstyn
